data.actual_result: The pop up goes away but the role stays
data.expected_result: Role get's removed without a problem
data.short_description: Can't remove a role after giving it a permission
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you have admin rights - Go to a text channel - Edit the roles for the channel - Add a role to the channel - Change 1 thing about it's permissions - Press delete role without saving - Pop up comes forward - Press "Okay"
